text: Lieutenant General Anthony Leonard Birks, (30 December 1941 – 21 January 2002) was a senior officer in the New Zealand Army. He served as Chief of the General Staff, the professional head of the New Zealand Army, from 1992 to 1995, and in New Zealand's most senior military post as Chief of Defence Force from 1995 until his retirement in 1999. In the 1978 New Year Honours, Birks was appointed a Member of the Order of the British Empire (Military Division), and in the 1987 Queen's Birthday Honours he was promoted to Officer of the Order of the British Empire. In the 1994 New Year Honours, he was made a Companion of the Order of the Bath. ==References== |- Category:1941 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Alumni of the Royal College of Defence Studies Category:Graduates of the Royal Military Academy Sandhurst Category:New Zealand Companions of the Order of the Bath Category:New Zealand generals Category:New Zealand military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:New Zealand Officers of the Order of the British Empire Category:People educated at Nelson College
